name: Hibco Plastics Expanded Polystyrene Foam (EPS)
description: Expanded Polystyrene Foam (EPS) is a molded polystyrene foam used in packaging applications and also has insulation applications. It can be used for blocking and bracing for furniture and appliances. Expanded Polystyrene Foam has a very high compressive strength, and is very compatible with corrugated cardboard and flexible foams. It is commonly used to package and protect water heaters, dishwashers, and large appliances. It also provides impact protection for sensitive electronic equipment. It is used for applications that require protection from shock and vibration.
